org.sensorhub.api.sensor

Class SensorControlEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sensorhub.api.common.Event<EventTypeEnum>
      • org.sensorhub.api.common.EntityEvent<CommandStatus.StatusCode>
        • org.sensorhub.api.sensor.SensorControlEvent

  • public class SensorControlEvent
extends EntityEvent<CommandStatus.StatusCode>

    Special type of immutable event carrying status data by reference

    Since:
    Nov 5, 2010

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Status of the command that triggered this event

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SensorControlEvent(long timeStamp, ISensorControlInterface controlInterface, CommandStatus status)
      Constructs the event for an individual sensor
      SensorControlEvent(long timeStamp, java.lang.String sensorID, ISensorControlInterface controlInterface, CommandStatus status)
      Constructs the event for a sensor that is part of a network

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getSensorID()
      Gets the unique ID of the sensor related to this event.
      For sensor networks, it can be either the ID of the network as a whole (if the command was global) or the ID of one of the sensor in the network (if the command was sent to a particular sensor).
      ISensorControlInterface getSource()
      Gets the source of the event as an object reference.
      CommandStatus getStatus()

    • Constructor Detail

      • SensorControlEvent

        public SensorControlEvent(long timeStamp,
                          ISensorControlInterface controlInterface,
                          CommandStatus status)
        Constructs the event for an individual sensor
        Parameters:
        timeStamp - unix time of event generation
        controlInterface - sensor control interface that generated the event
        status - status of command at time the event is generated

      • SensorControlEvent

        public SensorControlEvent(long timeStamp,
                          java.lang.String sensorID,
                          ISensorControlInterface controlInterface,
                          CommandStatus status)
        Constructs the event for a sensor that is part of a network
        Parameters:
        timeStamp - unix time of event generation
        sensorID - ID of individual sensor in the network
        controlInterface - sensor control interface that generated the event
        status - status of command at time the event is generated

    • Method Detail

      • getSensorID

        public java.lang.String getSensorID()
        Gets the unique ID of the sensor related to this event.
        For sensor networks, it can be either the ID of the network as a whole (if the command was global) or the ID of one of the sensor in the network (if the command was sent to a particular sensor).
        Returns:
        the ID of the sensor that this event refers to

      • getStatus

        public CommandStatus getStatus()

        public ISensorControlInterface getSource()
        Description copied from class: Event
        Gets the source of the event as an object reference.
        Overrides:
        getSource in class Event<CommandStatus.StatusCode>
        Returns:
        Source object that generated this event
